overview: On the eve of the Operation Desert Storm in the first Gulf War, the Italian government deployed eight Tornado Fighter-bombers.  Gianmarco Bellini was one of the pilots, shot down, captured, abused and returned beat up but able to rise to the rank of General.
tagline: Gianmarco Bellini was shot down during the first Iraq War, captured, abused and returned beat up but able to rise to the rank of General.
title: Gianmarco Bellini: Gulf War POW
